Title: In Harm's Way
Writer: Joshua Hamilton, Michael Dante DiMartino (created by), Bryan Konietzko (created by)
Actors: Janet Varney, David Faustino, P.J. Byrne, J.K. Simmons
Plot: Korra finds out that the Earth Queen imprisoned airbenders to create an army. Jenora leads an investigation with her spiritual projection. Lin joins the Avatar Team.
